wogwt.translatable.http
Class UpdateOnClickListener

java.lang.Object
  wogwt.translatable.http.Updater
      wogwt.translatable.http.UpdateOnClickListener

public class UpdateOnClickListener
extends Updater

Intended mainly to turn a regular WOHyperlink with an ACTION binding into an ajax link. This listener will do an ajax request to the url obtained from the onClick sender's "href" attribute and replace the updateContainer with the response.
